quests.name: Daily Greeting
quests.description: Say hello in the chat to earn chi!

quests.name: Daily Duel
quests.description: Challenge a friend to a duel.

quests.name: Weekly Team Spirit
quests.description: Participate in 5 team events this week.

quests.name: Artifact Hunter
quests.description: Find and claim 3 artifacts this week.
